author: ats2008
body:
Uploads the  caloparams  and related customizations used after September 2024 to the CMSSW.  ( `caloParams_2024_v0_3_cfi` ). This includes the new Isolation working point LUTs derived to cope with both calorimeter ageing and new calorimeter conditions.

The   LUTS are also uploaded to the data repo in the pr https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/L1Trigger-L1TCalorimeter/pull/24

FYI : @caruta @aloeliger @slaurila @jngadiub
title: Calo Layer-2 EG conditions update for 2024
